source_data.description: Node.js Passport Login course, in this course we will learn about the Node.js Passport Login system, a powerful tool for implementing user authentication in Node.js web applications. You'll explore the fundamentals of Passport.js, including its various authentication strategies such as Local, OAuth, and OpenID. Through hands-on exercises, you'll discover how to set up and configure Passport.js to authenticate users, store their information securely, and manage sessions effectively. By the end of the course, you'll have the skills to create a robust login system that enhances the security and usability of your Node.js web applications.
